choices.choice_text:
A. Rational
These are numbers that can be written as fractions of Integers (e.g., -2/3).

B. Not a Real number
These are Nonreal Complex numbers OR things that are not numbers (e.g., dividing by 0).

C. Whole
These are the counting numbers with 0 (0, 1, 2, 3, ...).

D. Irrational
These cannot be written as a fraction of Integers.
